comment:
* A class representing capability of the SoftAp.
 * {@see WifiManager}
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: SOFTAP_FEATURE_ACS_OFFLOAD
variables.comment:
* Support for automatic channel selection in driver (ACS). * Driver will auto select best channel based on interference to optimize performance. * * flag when {@link R.bool.config_wifi_softap_acs_supported)} is true. * *

* Use {@link WifiManager.SoftApCallback#onInfoChanged(SoftApInfo)} and * {@link SoftApInfo#getFrequency} and {@link SoftApInfo#getBandwidth} to get * driver channel selection result.

variables.name: SOFTAP_FEATURE_CLIENT_FORCE_DISCONNECT
variables.comment:
* Support for client force disconnect. * flag when {@link R.bool.config_wifi_sofap_client_force_disconnect_supported)} is true * *

* Several Soft AP client control features, e.g. specifying the maximum number of * Soft AP clients, only work when this feature support is present. * Check feature support before invoking * {@link SoftApConfiguration.Builder#setMaxNumberOfClients(int)}

variables.name: SOFTAP_FEATURE_WPA3_SAE
variables.comment:
* Support for WPA3 Simultaneous Authentication of Equals (WPA3-SAE).
     *
     * flag when {@link config_wifi_softap_sae_supported)} is true.

methods.name: public int getMaxSupportedClients()
methods.comment: * Get the maximum supported client numbers which AP resides on.

methods.name: public void setMaxSupportedClients(int maxClient)
methods.comment:
* Set the maximum supported client numbers which AP resides on.
     *
     * @param maxClient maximum supported client numbers for the softap.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean areFeaturesSupported(@HotspotFeatures long features)
methods.comment:
* Returns true when all of the queried features are supported, otherwise false.
     *
     * @param features One or combination of the following features:
     * {@link #SOFTAP_FEATURE_ACS_OFFLOAD}, {@link #SOFTAP_FEATURE_CLIENT_FORCE_DISCONNECT} or
     * {@link #SOFTAP_FEATURE_WPA3_SAE}.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
